Entries.Introduction: Ah, the new farmer we've all been expecting... and whose arrival has sparked many a conversation!#$b#I'm Elena... I live in the little cabin by the beach. It's a pleasure to meet you.
Entries.dating_Elliott_memory_oneday: %Elena whispers a sweet secret into your ear.
Entries.SquidFest: It's rare to see so many people at the beach. All for the love of squid!
Entries.divorced: ...$s#$e#Why do you torment me? Can't you see you've shattered all my hopes and dreams?$s
Entries.wonIceFishing: Well, if it isn't the town's number one ice fisher! That was truly an impressive performance.$h#$e#I never stand a chance, but I always participate just to be sporting.
Entries.Thu6: Sometimes I wonder if I might just have an inflated self-image and no real skills...$s#$e#No, no... I'm not fishing for compliments. Though they are appreciated...
Entries.event_boat1: So am I.$l^... I was worried you might not feel this way about another woman.$l

Entries.married_Elliott: Elena's a real romantic... I'm sure your days will be filled with poetry!$h

Entries.Indoor_Day_0: I've been taking much better care of myself now that we're together. The bachelorette life wasn't particularly healthy for me.
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: From the brightest winter star, to the shimmer of an iridium vein... nothing can compare to my wonderful man.$l^From the brightest winter star, to the fragrant fairy rose... nothing can compare with your captivating beauty.$l
Entries.OneKid_3: Caring for babies isn't exactly my strong suit... but I'll do my best to be a good mother.
Entries.summer_27: All good things must come to an end, including the joyful days of summer. The key to happiness is to accept change without judgement.
Entries.fall_26: Would you still love me if I guzzled two gallons of pumpkin ale at the Spirit's Eve festival? Sometimes a woman has primitive urges...
Entries.winter_1: Winter is a great time to read books and play the piano. Remember to pause and enjoy a quiet moment or two.

Entries.event_room1: Okay... that'll require a great script. Maybe I'll ask Elena for advice next time I see her at the saloon.$s

Entries.AcceptGift_(O)Book_Crabbing: Aye...  A timeless classic. Brings a tear to me eye, with every read. A fisherman can never have too many copies! Thank ye.$h
Entries.married: Giving up the bachelor life, eh?^Giving up the single life, eh?#$b#Just don't forget to make time for fishing...
Entries.fishCaught_159: So, you finally conquered the Crimsonfish! That fish has been taunting me for many years. He nearly nibbled through the wood under me house!
Entries.fishCaught_163: By the stem o' me pipe... You actually caught 'the Legend'. I never thought I'd see the day...$h#$b#Well, lad, you've done it... You're the best fisherman this valley's seen in a long time...$h^Well, miss, you've done it... You're the best angler this valley's seen in a long time...$h
Entries.fishCaught_775: Ah, so you finally snagged the Glacierfish... That's one of the slipperiest fish I've ever encountered!#$e#How many tries did it take ya?
Entries.FullCrabPond: *sniff*... Ah... That old familiar scent. You've been raisin' crabs, haven't ya?#$b#Yer a man after me own heart, @. Hah!$h^Yer a lady after me own heart, @. Hah!$h#$b#Here, take this. I found it on the beach... Been savin' it fer a special occasion. It's not every day I discover a fellow crab enthusiast! [797]
Entries.Mon: Ahoy there, son.^Ahoy there, lass.#$b#Looks like decent weather for fishing, eh?
Entries.Tue6: The ol' Man was a fisherman, you know. I grew up sailing between the fern islands, living from catch to catch.#$e#The fishing life is tough, but there's something about it that keeps you goin'.
Entries.Wed: Some fish come and go with the seasons. Others only come out at night or in the rain.
Entries.Thu: *mumble* *mumble* ...Eh? I would tell you about my thoughts, but it's a fisherman's secret.
Entries.Fri4: I'm a simple man... when my pipe is full, I'm happy. When my pipe is empty... well, then I just fill 'er up again.$u
Entries.Fair_Judged: Wow, I got a low score. I guess Mayor Lewis isn't much of a fish man. Oh well...$s

Entries.elliottReading: @,^I have great news... my novel is finished!! I'm giving a public reading this afternoon at the library. Hope to see you there! ^   -Elena[#]Elena's Reading
Entries.elliottBoat: Meet me at the docks on a sunny morning. I've got something in mind. ^   -Elena[#]Elena's Note
Entries.elliottLetter1: @, my love,^^I've just arrived in Grampleton, to start the tour. I've forgotten how hectic the city is! The streets are packed with people... they either seem in a mad hurry, or lost in a daze, unaware of their surroundings. I miss Pelican Town already!^^I begin the tour this evening, at a local bookstore. I must admit, I'm becoming a bit nervous at the thought of public speaking... my stomach feels as if it's been twisted into a soft pretzel and doused with spicy cheese dip. Wish me luck!^^-Love, Elena^^P.S. I hope you had a peaceful night, and weren't too scared all alone in that big house! %item conversationTopic ElliottGone2 0 %%[#]Letter From My Husband
Entries.elliottLetter2: My dear @,^^The first reading went well, though the audience was a bit smaller than I'd hoped. Still, I sold enough copies of the book to pay for my (bug-infested) hotel room!^^In a few hours, I leave for Zuzu City. If yesterday's reading was a warm-up, this next one will be a true napalm blast...^^I miss you very much. Remember to eat well! Oh, and don't forget the leftover crab cakes I put in the fridge...^-Love, Elena %item conversationTopic ElliottGone3 0 %%[#]Letter From My Husband 2
Entries.elliottLetter3: My sweet @,^^Last night in Zuzu City was quite the experience! It seems there's a large literary scene here... a few dozen people showed up at my reading!^^I even signed a couple of autographs... it's strange to be seen as someone important. It's all a matter of framing, a grand illusion... for truly I am no one special. Only your devoted Elena, as always.^^Currently I'm alone, in my hotel room, 'ingesting' a Joja Value Meal...^^Should this be called 'food'?^Or 'edible matter'?^I needn't long brood^It must be the latter^^I look forward to returning home soon. Hope you enjoyed the crab cakes.^^-Love, Elena %item conversationTopic ElliottGone4 0 %%[#]Letter From My Husband 3
Entries.elliottLetter4: In dreams, when graced with lofty view^I gaze upon the sunlit sea^What distant shores I've travelled to^But time now clouds my memory^^There is but one eternal place^Where I shall someday pass beyond^In Valley dear, where my love waits:^Our little home beside the pond^^-Elena %item conversationTopic ElliottGone5 0 %%[#]Letter From My Husband 4
Entries.elliottLetter5: My dear @,^^I won't bore you with any more details about my readings. They are mostly the same.^^I'm sure your time has been much more exciting! I can't wait to return and see what progress has been made.^^On these long travels between towns, I amuse myself by closing my eyes and envisioning the farm... I see kegs pulsing with sweet wine, a furnace ablaze with precious ore, and our little kitchen with the smell of cinnamon and nutmeg. There's a lot to enjoy!^^Just don't stay out too late in the mines, my love. It's dangerous in there! If you must go... bring plenty of food.^^-Love, Elena %item conversationTopic ElliottGone6 0 %%[#]Letter From My Husband 5
Entries.elliottLetter6: My dear @,^^This will be my last letter before I return home. I've had a fine trip... though nothing too exciting. It's been nice to meet people who enjoy my work, but I'm eager to return home.^^I look forward to the comfort of our little house, the satisfying farm work, a home-cooked meal, and most of all, cozying into the flannel sheets with you.^^See you soon!^-Love, Elena %item conversationTopic ElliottGone7 0 %%[#]Letter From My Husband 6

Entries.7: It's a page from someone's diary...^^...There are only a few 'older' bachelors and bachelorettes in town, and none of them are perfect! Harvey is really anxious and weak, but I know he would make a loyal and devoted husband. He likes coffee and pickles.^^Elena is a bit foppish and melodramatic, but she does have a nice chin. She likes crab cakes and pomegranates.^^Shane is messy and anti-social. But I think his gruff exterior is a defense mechanism, insulating his softness from the world. He likes Beer, Pizza, and Pepper Poppers.%revealtasteHarvey395%revealtasteHarvey342%revealtasteElliott732%revealtasteElliott637%revealtasteShane346%revealtasteShane206%revealtasteShane215
